I'm flexin' on 'em like torsos
These n***as slippin' like bar soap
These n***as listenin', use Morse code
Boy a n***a sippin' like parched throat
Excuse me
These n***as talkin' that beef shit
We'll check into it like that room's cheap
And all we sell is the greatest feeling on Earth
They paint me as a villian, I just autograph the artwork
Ain't got nothing left to prove, unless I gotta prove it in court
Live fast die young, and leave a beautiful corspe, yes lord
My n***a order like twenty bricks, I sent five bricks with four chicks

Kill all rats, I toast to that, and watch everybody I toast with

The people that I rolls with will leave holes in what you drove in
If anyone in that car live, you tell that n***a I owe him
Yeah, I got my mind right, and my money right, my head on my shoulders
And my eyesight a little blurry but it stand on my quota
And we find out mom's address and get your head mailed over
n***a you make that bed, lay in that bed, or get that bitch made over
